basics.name: Bowen Qin (秦博文)
basics.label: Researcher
basics.summary: Researcher at Beijing Academy of Artificial Intelligence (BAAI), specializing in the evaluation, alignment, and code intelligence of large language models (LLMs).

work.name: Beijing Academy of Artificial Intelligence (BAAI)
work.summary: Contributing to FlagEval platform, leading the design of its core subjective evaluation system for LLM evaluation.

work.name: Alibaba DAMO Academy
work.summary: Research on text-to-SQL parsing and pre-trained language models, mentored by Binyuan Hui.

education.institution: Shenzhen Institute of Advanced Technology, Chinese Academy of Sciences

awards.title: Outstanding Student Award
awards.awarder: University of Chinese Academy of Sciences

awards.title: President's Scholarship
awards.awarder: University of Chinese Academy of Sciences

awards.title: DAMO Academy Outstanding Research Intern Award
7th Place in AI Safety and Security Challenge
awards.awarder: AI Singapore & National University of Singapore
awards.summary: Invited to attend the Singapore International Cyber Week (SICW) 2024.

projects.name: FlagEval Platform
projects.summary: Led the design of the core subjective evaluation system for large language model evaluation at BAAI.

projects.name: FlagJudge
projects.summary: Developed a GenRM model for LLM evaluation that predates DeepMind's similar work by one year.

projects.name: BIRD Benchmark
projects.summary: Member of the BIRD team driving the development of text-to-SQL for real-world database applications.
